mapper.select: SELECT o.ordersno, o.uid, o.regdate, o.carprice, m.mid, co.colid, w.wid, i.iid, m.mname, co.coloption, w.woption,i.ioption,o.shipprice,o.pay, o.shipname, o.shipphone,o.shippost,o.shipaddr,o.shipdaddr,o.finalprice FROM ORDERS o INNER JOIN model m ON m.mid = o.mid INNER JOIN color co ON co.colid = o.colid INNER JOIN wheel w ON w.wid = o.wid INNER JOIN interior i ON i.iid = o.iid WHERE ORDERSNO=#{ordersno}
